deletion-warning: Once deleted, it will be gone forever. Please be certain.
dialog-description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this organization, remove its data from our servers and every member looses their membership.
name-max-length: Your organization name must be at most 255 characters long.
name-min-length: Your organization name must be at least 3 characters long.
name-must-be-string: Your organization's name must be a string.
organization-name-change-warning: <1>Warning:</1> Changing your organization's name will break all existing links to your organization.
title: General
